pullRequest.title: Explicitly disable transaction hive tables in TestTablePartitioningSelect
pullRequest.bodyText:
Hive 3.1 enables transactional tables when ORC is used by default but the test does not work when run against transactional tables.
Adding the test to the storage format group so that it runs against hdp3.1 as well.

nodes.bodyText: let's not add it to the group. it's already heavy

commit.message:
Explicitly disable transaction hive tables in TestTablePartitioningSelect

Hive 3.1 enables transactional tables when ORC is used by default but the test
does not work when run against transactional tables
